hero.trusted_by: Loved and Trusted by millions of people
hero.description: Experience the best delivery service with our state-of-the-art logistics. We ensure your packages arrive on time, every time.

features.intro: In a fast-moving world, we bring you speed, reliability, and sustainability all in one service. Our bike-powered delivery ensures your packages arrive on time, every time, without adding to pollution.
features.fastReliableDescr: Whether it's same-day or scheduled delivery, we get it there with precision.
features.ecoFriendlyDescr: Our bike couriers reduce carbon emissions, making every delivery green.
features.affordableSecureDescr: Competitive pricing with insurance options for your valuable items.
features.convenientHassleFreeDescr: Real-time tracking and flexible delivery slots tailored to your needs.
features.promise: Join us in choosing a smarter, greener way to deliver. Your package deserves the best, and so does the planet."

service1.name: Eco-Friendly Standard Delivery
service1.descr: Cost-effective delivery using our fleet of eco-friendly bikes. Ideal for non-urgent packages within the city.

service2.name: Express Bike Delivery
service2.descr: Fast and efficient bike delivery for small to medium packages, ensuring arrival within 1-2 business days.

service3.name: Same-Day Bike Delivery
service3.descr: Need it fast? Our riders deliver your package within hours, perfect for urgent deliveries within city limits.

service4.name: Scheduled Bike Delivery
service4.descr: Plan your delivery at your convenience. Choose a specific time slot for a smooth and hassle-free drop-off.

service5.name: Secure & Insured Bike Delivery
service5.descr: For valuable or fragile items, our trained couriers ensure safe transportation with insurance coverage.

service6.name: Sustainable Business Deliveries
service6.descr: Eco-conscious bulk deliveries for businesses, using bikes to reduce carbon emissions while ensuring timely arrivals.

about_us.title: About Us
about_us.paragraph_1: At e-bike delivery, we are revolutionizing urban package delivery with our fleet of eco-friendly electric bikes. Our mission is to provide fast, reliable, and sustainable delivery solutions that reduce carbon emissions and traffic congestion in cities.
about_us.paragraph_2: We specialize in same-day and last-mile delivery, ensuring that your packages arrive on time while keeping our streets cleaner and greener. Our couriers navigate through traffic efficiently using e-bikes, allowing us to offer a cost-effective and eco-conscious alternative to traditional delivery services.
about_us.paragraph_3: With real-time tracking, secure handling, and exceptional customer service, we make sure every package reaches its destination safely. Whether you're a business looking for a dependable delivery partner or an individual sending a package across town, e-bike delivery is here to deliver—fast, green, and hassle-free.

choose_us.title: Smart, Fast, and Eco-Friendly Deliveries
choose_us.text: We provide fast, reliable, and eco-friendly delivery services using electric bikes. Whether you need a package delivered the same day, within hours, or at a scheduled time, we ensure it arrives safely and on time. Our couriers handle everything from standard deliveries to secure and insured shipments with real-time tracking. With zero carbon emissions and a commitment to efficiency, we offer a smarter and more sustainable way to get your packages where they need to be.

review1.name: Alex Smith
review1.descr: Fantastic service! My package arrived on time, and I love that they use e-bikes to reduce pollution. Will definitely use them again!

review2.name: James Carter
review2.descr: Great eco-friendly initiative! The delivery was a bit slower than expected, but I appreciate the effort to go green.

review3.name: Mark Rodríguez
review3.descr: I had a small issue with tracking, but overall, the service was good. Love the concept of using e-bikes for deliveries!

review4.name: Mark Johnson
review4.descr: Excellent service! The delivery was quick, and I admire their commitment to sustainability. Highly recommend!

review5.name: Adersson White
review5.descr: I appreciate companies that care about the environment. My order arrived in perfect condition, and the courier was very friendly.

review6.name: Darren Brown
review6.descr: Very innovative concept! The service was reliable, but I hope they expand their coverage to more areas.

review7.name: Bill Chen
review7.descr: Super fast delivery and excellent customer support! Plus, it's great to see a company committed to sustainability.

contactUs.heading: Contact Us
contactUs.subheading: Have a question or need assistance? We're here to help! Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

footer.description: Fast, eco-friendly delivery solutions for your business. Reliable service with zero emissions.

chatbot.question_1: How does your company deliver packages?
chatbot.answer_1: We use electric bikes (e-bikes) to deliver packages efficiently and sustainably.
chatbot.question_2: Why do you use e-bikes instead of cars?
chatbot.answer_2: E-bikes are environmentally friendly, reduce traffic congestion, and are more cost-effective for local deliveries.
chatbot.question_3: How fast can your e-bikes deliver packages?
chatbot.answer_3: Our e-bikes can deliver packages within an hour for most local deliveries, depending on traffic and distance.
chatbot.question_4: Do you deliver in all areas of the city?
chatbot.answer_4: We focus on urban areas with high demand for eco-friendly delivery options, but we're expanding to more regions.
chatbot.question_5: Are there any restrictions on the types of packages you can deliver?
chatbot.answer_5: We deliver most small to medium-sized packages. However, there are restrictions for oversized or hazardous items.
chatbot.question_6: How can I track my package?
chatbot.answer_6: You can track your package in real-time via our app, which shows the location of your delivery rider.
chatbot.question_7: What happens if my delivery is delayed?
chatbot.answer_7: If there is a delay, you'll receive a notification with an updated estimated delivery time.
chatbot.question_8: How much does it cost for a delivery?
chatbot.answer_8: Our pricing is based on the delivery distance and package size. Check our website or app for accurate pricing.
chatbot.question_9: Can I schedule a delivery in advance?
chatbot.answer_9: Yes, you can schedule a delivery up to 7 days in advance through our app.
chatbot.question_10: What if I need to change my delivery address?
chatbot.answer_10: You can update the delivery address through our app before the package is picked up by the rider.
chatbot.question_11: Do you offer any eco-friendly packaging options?
chatbot.answer_11: Yes, we offer recyclable and sustainable packaging for our deliveries.
chatbot.question_12: How can I contact customer support?
chatbot.answer_12: You can reach our customer support team through the contact section of our app or website.
chatbot.question_13: Is your delivery service available outside of business hours?
chatbot.answer_13: We offer deliveries during extended hours, including weekends, to accommodate customers' needs.
chatbot.question_14: How can I sign up for your delivery service?
chatbot.answer_14: You can sign up easily through our website or app by providing basic details and setting up a delivery account.
